character.desc: Nichole is your ship chemist. She creates lots of Reagents and benefits from discarding cards.

ReactionCost.name: Reaction
ReactionCost.desc: Discards the left-most Reagent in your hand to trigger this effect. If there are no reagents in your hand, does nothing.

variableHintDiscard.desc: Counts the number of cards in your discard pile.

Reagent.name: Reagent
Reagent.desc: Used for Reactions. When discarded, activate the On Discard effect.

Adaptability.name: ADAPTABILITY
Adaptability.desc: You start each combat with two <c=status>REDRAW</c>.

ChemicalBooster.name: CHEMICAL BOOSTER
ChemicalBooster.desc: When you would create a Simple Solution, create Simple Solution A instead.

DailyPreperations.name: DAILY PREPERATIONS
DailyPreperations.desc: At the start of combat, add two Simple Solutions to your deck.

DelayedReaction.name: DELAYED REACTION
DelayedReaction.desc: Draw 2 extra cards on your second turn.

Gratification.name: GRATIFICATION
Gratification.desc: The first Reagent you play each turn activates its On Discard effect.

InspiredMix.name: INSPIRED MIX
InspiredMix.desc: The first time you play a Reagent each turn, draw a card.

MakeshiftIngredients.name: MAKESHIFT INGREDIENTS
MakeshiftIngredients.desc: On pickup, select a card in your deck to gain Reagent.
